name: Knowledge Worker Kit
tagline: Your Personal Shield Against AI Obsolescence

problem: Being a Knowledge Worker today is more challenging than ever, facing information overload, AI revolution, and no clear path forward. Without proper systems, you're stuck in reactive mode, burning out trying to keep up.
problemPoints: Feeling overwhelmed by the pace of innovation
Facing AI revolution - staying relevant when AI can seemingly do it all
No clear path forward in your career
Scattered knowledge, no system that scales
agitate: Hours wasted on busywork instead of meaningful progress. Can't leverage AI effectively without the foundation. Stuck in reactive mode, never getting ahead. Skills feel outdated as AI advances. No clear career trajectory. Working hard but not seeing results. Burning out trying to keep up.

solution: Knowledge Worker Kit: Your complete system for becoming a top-tier knowledge worker in the AI era. A second brain system, comprehensive guide, and private community with proven, battle-tested systems.
solutionPoints: Personal shield against AI obsolescence - stay relevant
Second brain system that transforms how you process knowledge
Private community with like-minded knowledge workers
Lifetime access to all content and future updates
description: The Knowledge Worker Kit is a private community (part of Knowii Community) and deep dive guide exploring everything you need to become and remain a top-tier Knowledge Worker. Based on 20+ years of experience from Sébastien Dubois, this is a proven, battle-tested system that works in real life. Private community + detailed guide (Notion space) exploring Knowledge Work, AI, Knowledge Management, Personal Organization, Learning, Time Management, Project Management. Evergreen project with continuous expansion.
features: Private Community Access - Exclusive Knowii community for knowledge workers
Comprehensive Guide - Notion space with systems, templates, guidance (13 topic areas)
Clarity - Values, behaviors, goals, priorities, intentions
Habits & Systems - Routines, processes, methods for effortless productivity
Learning - How you learn, effectiveness, research, AI/LLM leverage
PKM & Journaling - Personal knowledge management, note-taking/making, tools, structures
Projects Organization - Information architecture, documentation, backlogs
Planning & Prioritization - Project/task planning, deadlines, prioritization methods
Task Management - Personal/professional tasks at scale
Focus & Action - Time management, attention, daily execution techniques
Personal Development - Mind and body wellness
Personal Organization - Zen techniques, information management
Work - Doing the work, attitude, results, collaboration
All Past & Future Events - Workshops, meetups, knowledge-sharing sessions, invited talks, AMAs
